actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 101-181.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 341.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to permit issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel the KARLISSA.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue for a named vessel a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to permit issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel the KARLISSA.
